attributes.action: Cease in making steps towards privatization of the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the last ten years the government has been steadily and stealthily handing over more and more public money to private interests under the rubric of NHS 'reforms'. The public have not been properly informed or consulted about the range of these reforms, neither has a true comparison of efficiency of public/private structures been given.
